overview: A first-rate shepherd, Gyabo and his wife have been worried about his melancholy son Tenzin, but Tenzin grew up with the unexpected black sheep. By the fall of 1999, gyabo hoped to follow the tradition complete the marriage for his 14-year-old son, then he received notification from the government, his son must go to school. tenzin and black sheep run to unknown destiny.
title: The Black Sheep
